projects.title: Furball
projects.description: Catch mouse and gave it as a present purr as loud as possible, knock everything off the table for sweet beast.

projects.title: Ball of fluff
projects.description: Roll around on the carpet, chase dust particles, and demand belly rubs only to change your mind the second a hand approaches.

projects.title: Whisker Wonderland
projects.description: Chase laser pointers, nap in sunbeams, and pounce on imaginary creatures. Become master of house decoration by shedding fur everywhere.

projects.title: Paws & Claws
projects.description: Perform a dramatic stretch on human's keyboard, meow incessantly for food, and knock over water glasses for fun.

projects.title: Mice in Disguise
projects.description: Pretend to be uninterested in toys, then suddenly launch into action. Stare into space mysteriously, as if pondering life's deep questions.

projects.title: Kitty Code Craze
projects.description: Debug human's code by walking across keyboard. Sit on the mouse (the real one). Make a nest out of discarded wires.
